message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's worth $12000 to us. Would you be interested in discussing this further?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. I believe it's worth less than $12000 to me. I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product.
Thank you for your proposal, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Based on our internal valuation, we believe the product is worth more. I am proposing a price of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand that the product has value to you, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay up to $10000 for it. I would like to keep the price at $10000 if possible.
I appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway, Bob. Considering the value we place on the product and your offer, I am proposing a price of $10250 for the product.
I understand Alice, but I still feel that $10000 is the most I can reasonably pay for this product. I am unable to increase my offer beyond that amount.
After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate closer to your last offer. Therefore, I am proposing a final price of $10125 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am comfortable with the price of $10000 for this product. I hope we can agree on this final price.
